title: 1919년 In re the Probate of the Last Will & Testament of Carter 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: In re the Probate of the Last Will & Testament of Carter. 판결일: 1919-09-15. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of the Probate of the Last Will and Testament of Eliza A. Carter
**판결일**: 1919-09-15
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 189 A.D. 883

## 판결문 요약


Order modified by striking therefrom the words: “ It shall also state the facts which are claimed by the contestant to constitute such undue influence and the facts upon which is founded the charge of undue influence,” and also the words: “ And in what manner the alleged fraud was committed or practiced and the facts and circumstances upon which is founded the charge of fraud alleged,” and as so modified order unanimously affirmed, without costs.
...
